experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Updating core functionality for a digital herbarium platform including rapid data entry workflows, batch processing capabilities for large-scale specimen digitization, AI-powered transcription with configurable machine learning models, and containerized deployment architecture to streamline researchers' specimen cataloging and data management processes.

experiences.title: Fullstack Engineer Intern
description: Building a police accountability platform that aggregates Boston Police Department data into organized officer profiles and activity reports, providing transparent community access to local policing information.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Building an AI pipeline to digitize and transcribe historical property records for the Massachusetts Registry of Deeds, extracting structured data from handwritten index books dating back to the 1600s. Working with OCR and VLMs to create searchable archives for researchers and the public.

experiences.title: Fullstack Engineer Intern
description: Engineered a comprehensive digital mapping platform for the City of Boston that streamlines access to LGBTQ+ community resources, featuring interactive neighborhood-based search capabilities and real-time resource information updates.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed a secure web interface for researchers to remotely submit 3D printing and testing tasks to an autonomous robotics system that optimizes mechanical properties for applications like helmet pads and crumple zones.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Streamlining the subletting process for students by building a platform that prioritizes convenience, safety, and privacy.
